thread.title: Tom Brady turns down NBC interview after Colts game
thread.title_full: Tom Brady turns down NBC interview after Colts game

author: Larry Brown
title: Tom Brady turns down NBC interview after Colts game
text:
Tom Brady turns down NBC interview after Colts game October 18, 2015 0 0 
Tom Brady continued a season-long practice of declining postgame interviews with NBC when he turned down the chance to be interviewed following the Patriots’ 34-27 win over the Indianapolis Colts. 
Brady, who went 23-of-37 for 312 yards and three touchdowns in the victory, made a quick exit from the field at Lucas Oil Stadium after the game. NBC mentioned that he declined an interview. Instead, they interviewed defensive end Chandler Jones, who had 2.5 sacks. 
Brady abruptly exiting the field actually caused a problem for a photographer who took a spill: Photographer goes down, covering Tom Brady can be hazardous pic.twitter.com/PbhIH5DxqP 
— The Cauldron (@TheCauldron) October 19, 2015 
Brady also made headlines when he declined an interview with NBC following the Patriots’ win over the Steelers on opening night. Brady said at the time that this was part of an effort to reduce his interactions with the media after the whole Deflategate mess. Filed Under:
